description:
When testing with ami-tty (uec ttylinux image), the volume test fails with the following error:

Volume is not the right size:  bash: blockdev: command not found

This is due to the use of blockdev, which doesn't exist in that busybox install.
title: Volume size smoketest broken with busybox image

comments.content:
When testing with ami-tty (uec ttylinux image), the volume test fails with the following error:

Volume is not the right size:  bash: blockdev: command not found

This is due to the use of blockdev, which doesn't exist in that busybox install.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
